## Specific analysis xy, describe!
```{r Analysis xy, fig.height=3, fig.width=3}
d=data.frame(a=rnorm(20,1), c=as.factor(c(rep(1,10), rep(2,10))))

ggplot(d, aes(x=c, y=a, fill=NULL)) + geom_violin() + geom_boxplot(width=0.4) +
   geom_point(shape=1, color="gray70", size=3, position = position_jitter(width = 0.5, height = 0.1))

```
